description: The initiative focuses on transforming a 1970s building into a multifunctional space featuring a heated greenhouse. This project aims to integrate energy efficiency, food production, and social engagement, enhancing community ties and promoting urban agriculture. By involving local residents and addressing regulatory challenges, the initiative seeks to demonstrate the potential of underutilized urban spaces while fostering food education and sustainability. Ultimately, it highlights the value of innovative approaches to urban living and community well-being.
name: Symbiose Serre Bio
